                    .addComponent(btnclear, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, Short.MAX_VALUE))
                .addGap(12, 12, 12))
        );

        getContentPane().add(jPanel2);
        jPanel2.setBounds(0, 0, 280, 350);

        jPanel3.setLayout(null);
        getContentPane().add(jPanel3);
        jPanel3.setBounds(263, 11, 0, 343);

    private void btn0ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn0.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btn5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn5.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btndivActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
        num1=Double.parseDouble(textfield.getText());
        textfield.setText("");
        operations = "/";
    }                                      

    private void btn1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn1.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btnaddActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
        num1=Double.parseDouble(textfield.getText());
        textfield.setText("");
        operations = "+";
    }                                      

    private void btn3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn3.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void textfieldActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                         

    private void btn2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn2.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btndotActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
        if(!textfield.getText().contains("."));
        textfield.setText(textfield.getText()+btndot.getText());

    }                                      

    private void btn7ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn7.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btnmultActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
        num1=Double.parseDouble(textfield.getText());
        textfield.setText("");
        operations = "*";
    }                                       

    private void btn9ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn9.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btnclearActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        textfield.setText("");
    }                                        

    private void btn8ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn8.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btn4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn4.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void btnsubActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
        num1=Double.parseDouble(textfield.getText());
        textfield.setText("");
        operations = "-";
    }                                      

    private void btnequalActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        num2 = Double.parseDouble(textfield.getText());
        if("+".equals(operations))
        {
            result=num1+num2;
            answers = String.format("%,2f",result);
            textfield.setText(answers);
        }
        else if("-".equals(operations))
        {
            result=num1-num2;
            answers = String.format("%,2f",result);
            textfield.setText(answers);
        }
        else if("*".equals(operations))
        {
            result=num1*num2;
            answers = String.format("%,2f",result);
            textfield.setText(answers);
        }
        else if("/".equals(operations))
        {
            result=num1/num2;
            answers = String.format("%,2f",result);
            textfield.setText(answers);
        }
        else if("%".equals(operations))
        {
            result=num2%num1;
            answers = String.format("%,2f",result);
            textfield.setText(answers);

        }

    }                                        

    private void btn6ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        String str = textfield.getText()+btn6.getText();
        textfield.setText(str);
    }                                    

    private void jCheckBox5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                           
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                          

    private void jcheck3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
       if(jcheck3.isSelected())
       {
        txtpizza.setEditable(true);
        txtpizza.setText("");
        txtpizza.requestFocus();
       }
       else
       {
       txtpizza.setEditable(false);
       txtpizza.setText("");
       }
    }

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
     System.exit(0);
    }                                        

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
   textfield.setText("");
              txtf.setText("0");
              txtbis.setText("0");
              txtcake.setText("0");
              txtpizza.setText("0");
              txtveg.setText("0");
              sttext.setText("0.00");
              tdtext.setText("0.00");
              totaltext.setText("0.00");
              tatext.setText("0.00");
              
              jcheck1.setSelected(false);
              jcheck2.setSelected(false);
                
               jcheck3.setSelected(false);
               jcheck4.setSelected(false);
               jcheck5.setSelected(false);
              
              
          
    }                                        

    private void sttextActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                      

    private void jcheck1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
       if(jcheck1.isSelected())
       {
        txtf.setEditable(true);
        txtf.setText("");
        txtf.requestFocus();
       }
       else
       {
       txtf.setEditable(false);
       txtf.setText("");
       }
    }                                       

    private void txtfActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void jcheck2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
      if(jcheck2.isSelected())
       {
        txtbis.setEditable(true);
        txtbis.setText("");
        txtbis.requestFocus();
       }
       else
       {
       txtbis.setEditable(false);
       txtbis.setText("");
       }
    }                                       

    private void jcheck4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
        if(jcheck4.isSelected())
       {
        txtcake.setEditable(true);
        txtcake.setText("");
        txtcake.requestFocus();
       }
       else
       {
       txtcake.setEditable(false);
       txtcake.setText("");
       }
    }                                       

    private void jcheck5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
        if(jcheck5.isSelected())
       {
        txtveg.setEditable(true);
        txtveg.setText("");
        txtveg.requestFocus();
       }
       else
       {
       txtveg.setEditable(false);
       txtveg.setText("");
       }
    }                                       

    private void jButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
if((jcheck1.isSelected()) || (jcheck2.isSelected()) || (jcheck3.isSelected()) || (jcheck4.isSelected()) || (jcheck5.isSelected()))   
{
    double f =Double.parseDouble(txtf.getText())*50;
    double b=Double.parseDouble(txtbis.getText())*20;
        
    double p =Double.parseDouble(txtpizza.getText())*100;
    double c =Double.parseDouble(txtcake.getText())*80;
    double v =Double.parseDouble(txtveg.getText())*40;
    
    double totalitem=f+b+p+c+v;
    double del=totalitem*5/100;
    
    double cgst=totalitem*19/100;
    double sgst=cgst;
    double tax=cgst;
    double dis=totalitem*20/100;
    double amount=totalitem+tax-dis;
    double mileage=del*50/100;
    double subtotal=totalitem+tax;
    
    String item=String.format("%.2f",totalitem);
    itext.setText((String)item);
    
    String d=String.format("%.2f",del);
    dtext.setText((String)d);
    
    String mil=String.format("%.2f",mileage);
    mtext.setText((String)mil);
    
      String cgs=String.format("%.2f",cgst);
    ctext.setText((String)cgs);
    
      String sgs=String.format("%.2f",sgst);
    stext.setText((String)sgs);
    
      String ttax=String.format("%.2f",tax);
    totaltext.setText((String)ttax);
    
     String totalamount=String.format("%.2f",amount);
    tatext.setText((String)totalamount);
    
    
     String totaldis=String.format("%.2f",dis);
    tdtext.setText((String)totaldis);
    
    
     String subto=String.format("%.2f",subtotal);
    sttext.setText((String)subto);
    
}
else
{
   textfield.setText("enter choice");
          
}
    }                                        

    private void itextActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void dtextActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void jTextField8ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           

    private void jTextField7ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
                           
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                new Project().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }
